_comment.chromaticarsenal.main: Any lang key that begins with _comment does not appear in-game. They serve to explain references and other things.
_comment.chromaticarsenal.main2: You may translate these, but there is no point.
tooltip.chromaticarsenal.glass_shield.1: §6Fully absorbs the damage of one attack, and then shatters
tooltip.chromaticarsenal.glass_shield.2: §6The shield takes %1$s§6 second(s) to repair itself
tooltip.chromaticarsenal.shadow_treads.2: §6Increases movement speed by %1$s§b%%§6 when in a light level of %2$s§6 or less
tooltip.chromaticarsenal.shadow_treads.3: §6Prevents activation of Sculk Sensors from walking or falling short distances
tooltip.chromaticarsenal.duality_rings.1: §dIncreases the effectiveness of Magic Garlic Bread
_comment.chromaticarsenal.friendly_fire_: A play on the term "friendly fire", as the flower resists both self-damage and fire damage.
tooltip.chromaticarsenal.friendly_fire_f: §6Absorbs fire damage at the cost of durability, and recovers durability over time
§6Upon running out of durability, takes %1$s§6 seconds to begin restoring durability again
_comment.item.chromaticarsenal.lunar_cry: In the below line, "Luna" is a name. If you bother to translate it, translate it as such.
tooltip.chromaticarsenal.lunar_crystal.2: §6Upon striking an enemy, has a 1 in %1$s§6 chance to inflict Levitation at level %2$s§6 for %3$s§6 seconds
tooltip.chromaticarsenal.cryo_ring.2: §6Causes thrown snowballs to deal damage and freeze entities
tooltip.chromaticarsenal.cryo_ring.3: §6Snow Golems built while wearing this inherit these effects
tooltip.chromaticarsenal.bubble_amulet.1: §6Provides the wearer with additional air before drowning
tooltip.chromaticarsenal.bubble_amulet.2: §6While drowning, allows the wearer to swim even faster
tooltip.chromaticarsenal.bubble_amulet.3: §6Refills over time while outside of water
§6Allows sprinting to continue on an empty stomach
§6Allows for landing knockback attacks in rapid succession
§cMakes the ground harder to walk on
tooltip.chromaticarsenal.advancing_heart: §6This curio's power is scaled by how many advancements have been earned
text.config.chromaticarsenal.title: Chromatic Arsenal Config
text.config.chromaticarsenal.option.COMM: Golden Heart Duration
The duration of the Golden Heart's Absorption effect, in ticks. The effect is refreshed after this many ticks pass.
Golden Heart Amplifier
The amplifier of the Golden Heart's Absorption effect.
Glass Shield Cooldown
After blocking a hit, it will take the Glass Shield this many ticks to recover.
Ward Crystal Incoming Multiplier
Magic damage received while wearing a Ward Crystal is multiplied by this value.
Ward Crystal Outgoing Multiplier
Magic damage dealt while wearing a Ward Crystal is multiplied by this value.
Shadow Treads Max Light Level
The highest possible light level in which the Shadow Treads' effect will activate. Note that very low values may not function as expected.
Shadow Treads Speed Modifier
The speed increase caused by the Shadow Treads' effect. 0.2 is equal to +20%%.
Duality Rings Damage Multiplier
The multiplier given to projectile attacks when the attacker is wearing Duality Rings.
Duality Rings Strength Duration
The duration of the Duality Rings' Strength effect, in ticks. This is applied when consuming Magic Garlic Bread.
Duality Rings Strength Amplifier
The amplifier of the Duality Rings' Strength effect.
Duality Rings Health Boost Duration
The duration of the Duality Rings' Health Boost effect, in ticks. This is applied when consuming Magic Garlic Bread.
Duality Rings Health Boost Amplifier
The amplifier of the Duality Rings' Health Boost effect.
Friendly Fire Flower Recovery Time
The duration, in ticks, that it takes for the Friendly Fire Flower to recover one point of durability. This can be halved by standing in powder snow.
Friendly Fire Flower Overheat Cooldown
The duration, in ticks, that it takes for the Friendly Fire Flower to begin recovering durability after taking too much fire damage.
Lunar Crystal Gravity Modifier
The Lunar Crystal's gravity modifier. This is a "multiply total" attribute, -0.25 is equal to -25%%. You shouldn't set this to -1 or below.
Lunar Crystal Safe Fall Distance Modifier
The number of additional blocks the wearer of a Lunar Crystal is able to fall without taking damage.
Lunar Crystal Levitation Chance
A 1 in X chance for any attack from an entity wearing a Lunar Crystal to inflict Levitation.
Lunar Crystal Levitation Duration
The duration, in ticks, of the Lunar Crystal's Levitation effect.
Lunar Crystal Levitation Amplifier
The amplifier of the Lunar Crystal's Levitation effect.
Cryo Ring Snowball Damage
The amount of additional damage snowballs deal when hitting an entity.
Cryo Ring Vulnerable Snowball Damage
The amount of additional damage snowballs deal when hitting an entity vulnerable to freezing. This does not stack with Cryo Ring Snowball Damage.
Cryo Ring Freeze Ticks
The amount of ticks added to the freeze timer when an entity is hit by a snowball.
Bubble Amulet Swim Speed Modifier
The multiply total modifier given to swim speed when wearing the Bubble Amulet.
Momentum Stone Friction Addition
The amount added to the player's friction while the Momentum Stone is equipped. Base friction is 0.6. Capped at 0.989 unless Extremely Unbalanced Mode is enabled.
Momentum Stone Extremely Unbalanced Mode
Disables certain limits that prevent weird interactions caused by the Momentum Stone adding friction. Do not enable this unless you know what you are doing.
Advancing Heart Health Modifier
The Advancing Heart gives additional max health corresponding to the %% of advancements completed, times this number, floored to the nearest even number.
Advancing Heart Advancement Blacklist
The Advancing Heart will ignore advancements which contain any of these keywords in their name. By default, ignores an impossible advancement from Enigmatic Legacy.
text.config.chromaticarsenal.option.CLIE: Whenever ticks are converted to seconds in a tooltip, the decimal is kept if the resulting amount of seconds is under this value.
